name: LiveRez
tag_list: vacation-rental-software, vacation-rental-websites, vacation-rentals, cloud-based, saas, web-based
overview:
LiveRez is an all-in-one, cloud-based vacation rental software and services solution for professional vacation rental managers. The company has grown to work with more than 600 professional property manager partners since first offering its software in 2008.

The major components of the LiveRez system are a reservation and property management system, which includes a full content management system, a CRM, a property care module for managing housekeeping and maintenance activities, a full suite of reporting functions, and a real-time connection to QuickBooks for vacation rental accounting. The company also provides its partners with websites that are designed to increase the amount of bookings they receives online. In addition to its software, the company also offers a number of professional services and marketing assistance to help its partners optimize their use of the platform.

The company uses a partnership philosophy, backed by Pay-for-Performance pricing, which economically aligns the interests of LiveRez with the interests of each one of its partners.
